card.name: Aggression
card.text: While you have initiative, each Dwarf is damage +1. Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf who is damage +X to draw X cards. Discard this condition.

card.name: Battle in Earnest
card.text: Spot a Dwarf who is damage +X to place X wounds on minions.

card.name: Blood Runs Chill
card.text: Spot a Dwarf who is damage +X and exert that Dwarf twice to make an opponent discard X Shadow cards.

card.name: Counts But One
card.text: If Gimli is not assigned to a skirmish, add a threat to have him replace an unbound companion in a skirmish.

card.name: ·Gimli, Counter of Foes
card.text: Damage +1. For each wound on Gimli, he is strength +1 and damage +1.

card.name: Honed
card.text: Spot a Dwarf who is damage +X to make him strength +X.

card.name: Unheard of
card.text: If a Dwarf who is damage +X wins a skirmish, wound a minion not assigned to a skirmish X times.

card.name: Wish For Our Kinfolk
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a Dwarf companion and either an {Elven} companion or a {Gondor} Man to add a {Dwarven} token here. Skirmish: Remove a {Dwarven} token here to make a companion damage +1.

card.name: A Grey Ship
card.text: Spot an Elf companion and make the fellowship archery total -X (to a minimum of 0) to heal X unbound companions. You cannot use archery special abilities.

card.name: ·Legolas, Elven Stalwart
card.text: Archer. While you can spot 3 wounded minions, each minion skirmishing Legolas is strength -3.

card.name: Life of the Eldar
card.text: To play, spot 2 Elves. Discard an Elf to draw 3 cards.

card.name: Reckless We Rode
card.text: Exert an Elf companion and make the fellowship archery total -X (to a minimum of 0) to wound a minion X times. You cannot use archery special abilities.

card.name: Shake Off the Shadow
card.text: Fellowship: Exert an Elf companion and either a {Gandalf} companion or a {Dwarven} companion to add an {Elven} token here. Archery: Remove an {Elven} token here to make the fellowship archery total +1 (limit +2).

card.name: A Fool
card.text: At sites 1{K} to 5{K}, heal Gandalf. At any other site, prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.name: ·Gandalf, Leader of Men
card.text: When Gandalf is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Let Us Not Tarry
card.text: Exert Gandalf to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -1 for each Gandalf signet you spot.

card.name: Mighty Steed
card.text: If Gandalf is not assigned to a skirmish, spot Shadowfax or exert Gandalf to have Gandalf replace an unbound companion in a skirmish.

card.name: Not the First Halfling
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Gandalf and either an {Elven} companion or a {Shire} companion to add a {Gandalf} token here. Skirmish: Remove a {Gandalf} token here to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -2.

card.name: On Your Doorstep
card.text: Spot Gandalf and exert a companion to place a card of that companions culture from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.name: Saved From the Fire
card.text: Spot Gandalf and place a companion (except the Ring-bearer) in the dead pile to take 3 cards from that companions culture into hand from your draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: ·Shadowfax, Greatheart
card.text: Bearer must be Gandalf. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, each minion skirmishing Gandalf must exert. Skirmish: Add a threat to make Gandalf strength +1.

card.name: Hidden Even From Her
card.text: Gollum is fierce. Shadow: Spot 6 companions to play Gollum from your discard pile and exert a companion. Place this condition on top of your draw deck.

card.name: Larder
card.text: To play, spot a {Gollum} minion. Regroup: Discard an Orc from hand to add a {Gollum} token here. Skirmish: Remove a {Gollum} token here to make Shelob strength +3 (limit +6).

card.name: ·Promise Keeping
card.text: Each time a companion takes a wound during a skirmish that involved a {Gollum} minion, exert a companion.

card.name: ·Shelob, Eater of Light
card.text: Fierce. When you play Shelob, you may play a {Gollum} possession from your draw deck. Shelob is strength +3 for each minion stacked on a {Gollum} possession.

card.name: ·Shelob, Last Child of Ungoliant
card.text: Enduring. Fierce. While in a fierce skirmish, Shelob is damage +1.

card.name: ·Sméagol, Slippery Sneak
card.text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: Add threats equal to the total vitality of the minions Sméagol is skirmishing to discard Sméagol. Regroup: Discard Sméagol to take a {Gollum} minion from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Spider Poison
card.text: Skirmish: Remove a threat or a burden to transfer this possession to a companion skirmishing Shelob. Each time bearer is assigned to a skirmish, bearer must exert.

card.name: Still Far Ahead
card.text: Spot Sméagol to play the fellowships next site (replacing opponents site if necessary). The Shadow number of the fellowships next site is -1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Web
card.text: Regroup: If there are fewer than 3 cards stacked here, spot your Orc or {Gollum} minion to stack that minion here. Shadow: Play a {Gollum} minion stacked here as if played from hand.

card.name: At His Command
card.text: Exert Aragorn to make an unbound companion with the Aragorn signet strength +1 for each threat you spot.

card.name: Catapult
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Gondor} knights. Maneuver: Discard 2 cards from hand to reveal the top card of an opponents draw deck. Choose an opponent who must discard a Shadow card that has a twilight cost that is the same as the twilight cost of the revealed card.

card.name: Elessar's Edict
card.text: If a {Gondor} Wraith is about to be killed, discard him and either exhaust another {Gondor} Wraith or spot another exhausted {Gondor} Wraith to prevent that.

card.name: ·Faramir, Defender of Osgiliath
card.text: Knight. When you play Faramir (except in your starting fellowship), you may reveal the top 10 cards of your draw deck. You may play a knight revealed. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: Fourth Level
card.text: Fortification. Skirmish: Exert 2 {Gondor} Men or spot 3 knights to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a {Gondor} Man. Exhaust that minion.

card.name: ·Garrison of Gondor
card.text: Archer. Knight. To play, spot 3 {Gondor} companions. While you can spot a fortification, Garrison of Gondor is defender +1.

card.name: ·Imrahil, Prince of Dol Amroth
card.text: Knight. To play, spot a knight. Each time Imrahil wins a skirmish, you may exert 2 minions.

card.name: ·King of the Dead, Oathbreaker
card.text: Enduring. To play, spot a {Gondor} Wraith and add 2 threats. Response: If Aragorn is about to take a wound in a skirmish, exert King of the Dead to prevent that wound.

card.name: Knight of Dol Amroth
card.text: Knight. Each time this companion wins a skirmish, you may wound a minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Knight's Mount
card.text: Bearer must be a knight. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may wound a minion who is not assigned to a skirmish.

card.name: Oathbreaker
card.text: Enduring. To play, add a threat. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to discard a possession borne by a minion skirmishing this companion.

card.name: A Path Appointed
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a {Gondor} Man and either a {Dwarven} companion or a {Rohan} companion to add a {Gondor} token here. Regroup: Remove a {Gondor} token here to discard a minion.

card.name: ·Shadow Host
card.text: Enduring. To play, spot 2 exhausted {Gondor} Wraiths and add 2 threats. While Shadow Host is exhausted, it is defender +1.

card.name: Sixth Level
card.text: Fortification. Regroup: Exert a {Gondor} Man to play a {Gondor} fortification from your discard pile (limit 1).

card.name: Sleepless Dead
card.text: Enduring. To play, add a threat. Each time this companion wins a skirmish, you may exert him to discard a minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Spectral Sword
card.text: Bearer must be a {Gondor} Wraith. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to heal bearer.

card.name: Stronger and More Terrible
card.text: To play, add a threat. Each time your {Gondor} Wraith wins a skirmish, you may remove a threat.

card.name: Swept Away
card.text: Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. While you have initiative, exhausted {Gondor} Wraiths cannot take wounds.

card.name: Black Númenorean
card.text: Corsair. Fierce. Skirmish: If you have initiative, remove a {Raider} token to discard a possession borne by a character skirmishing this minion.

card.name: Black Sails of Umbar
card.text: When you play this possession, you may add a {Raider} token here. Shadow: Remove X {Raider} tokens here to play a corsair from your discard pile; its twilight cost is -X. Discard this possession.

card.name: ·Castamir of Umbar
card.text: Corsair. Enduring. Fierce. Shadow: Exert Castamir of Umbar and play a corsair to add 2 {Raider} tokens to a card that already has a {Raider} token on it.

card.name: Corsair Ballista
card.text: Bearer must be a corsair. While you have initiative, bearer is an archer and fierce.

card.name: Corsair Buccaneer
card.text: Corsair. When you play this minion, you may remove a threat to add 2 {Raider} tokens to a card that already has a {Raider} token on it.

card.name: Corsair Freebooter
card.text: Corsair. When you play this minion, you may remove 2 culture tokens to add 2 {Raider} tokens to a card that already has a {Raider} token on it.

card.name: Corsair Gunners
card.text: Corsair. Skirmish: If you have initiative, remove a {Raider} token to make a corsair fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Corsair Lookout
card.text: Corsair. When you play this minion, if you have initiative, you may discard an ally to add 2 {Raider} tokens to a card that already has a {Raider} token on it.

card.name: Corsair Marauder
card.text: Corsair. When you play this minion, if you can spot another corsair, you may discard a possession to add 2 {Raider} tokens to a card that already has a {Raider} token on it.

card.name: Corsair Plunderer
card.text: Corsair. When you play this minion, you may discard 2 cards from hand to add 2 {Raider} tokens to a card that already has a {Raider} token on it.

card.name: Corsair War Galley
card.text: When you play this possession, you may add a {Raider} token here. While you can spot 6 {Raider} tokens and a {Raider} Man, the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples players hand. Regroup: Add {1} for each {Raider} token you can spot. Discard this possession.

card.name: ·Haradrim Marksman
card.text: Southron. Archer. While you can spot another {Raider} Man, Ring-bound companions cannot take archery wounds.

card.name: ·Haradwaith
card.text: While you can spot a {Raider} minion at site 4K, the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples players hand. Response: If a companion is played, discard a {Raider} card from hand to add {5}. Discard this condition.

card.name: ·Heavy Axeman
card.text: Easterling. While you can spot 4 burdens, Heavy Axeman is strength +4 and fierce.

card.name: Line of Defense
card.text: While you can spot a mounted {Raider} Man, {Raider} Men cannot take wounds (except during skirmishes).

card.name: Mûmakil
card.text: Bearer must be a Southron. Bearer is fierce. While you have initiative or can spot 4 threats, bearer is damage +1.

card.name: Ships of Great Draught
card.text: Shadow: Remove a threat or discard a {Raider} card from hand to add a {Raider} token here. Regroup: Remove 2 {Raider} tokens here to place a {Raider} card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.name: Wind That Sped Ships
card.text: Make a corsair strength +1 for each {Raider} token you spot (limit +6). If you have initiative, you may place this event on top of your draw deck.

card.name: Between Nazgûl and Prey
card.text: Exert an enduring {Ringwraith} minion twice to assign that minion to an unbound companion.

card.name: Beyond All Darkness
card.text: Exert a Nazgûl to make him strength +2 and damage +1. If the character he is skirmishing is killed, the Free Peoples player must place his or her hand beneath his or her draw deck.

card.name: Black Dart
card.text: Archery: Spot your enduring or mounted Nazgûl to transfer this condition from your support area to an unbound companion. Discard a mount borne by that companion. Bearer cannot heal or bear mounts.

card.name: ·Black Flail
card.text: Bearer must be a Nazgûl. Skirmish: If bearer is The Witch-king, exert him and spot a possession borne by a character he is skirmishing to discard that possession.

card.name: ·Flung Into the Fray
card.text: When you play a minion stacked here, you may exert a companion. Regroup: If no minion is stacked here, spot your {Ringwraith} minon to stack it here. Shadow: Spot 2 {Ringwraith} minions to play a {Ringwraith} minion stacked here as if played from hand.

card.name: ·Gothmog, Morgul Commander
card.text: While you have initiative, each {Ringwraith} minion is an archer.

card.name: Mastered By Madness
card.text: Make a Nazgûl strength +2. If that Nazgûl wins this skirmish, you may discard a Free Peoples mount.

card.name: Morgul Ambusher
card.text: While you can spot 3 threats, the minion archery total is +2.

card.name: Morgul Creeper
card.text: While you can spot 3 burdens, the minion archery total is +2.

card.name: Morgul Lurker
card.text: While you have initiative, the minion archery total is +2.

card.name: Morgul Squealer
card.text: Shadow: Discard this minion to play a {Ringwraith} minion from your discard pile. Shadow: Spot 6 companions and discard this minion to play up to 2 {Ringwraith} minions from your draw deck; their twilight costs are each -1.

card.name: ·Streaming to the Field
card.text: For each {Ringwraith} Orc you can spot, the Free Peoples player must have an additional card in hand to have initiative. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a {Ringwraith} Orc strength +2.

card.name: ·Úlairë Attëa, Thrall of the One
card.text: Enduring. Regroup: Exert Úlairë Attëa and spot your {Ringwraith} minion to return that minion to your hand.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nertëa, Thrall of the One
card.text: Enduring. Fierce. The site number of each {Ringwraith} minion is -1.

card.name: ·Úlairë Otsëa, Thrall of the One
card.text: Enduring. Fierce. Regroup: Discard Úlairë Otsëa to add (X), where X is the current site number.

card.name: Unhindered
card.text: Make a Nazgûl strength +2. If that Nazgûl wins this skirmish, the Shadow has initiative until the end of the turn, regardless of the Free Peoples players hand.

card.name: Winged Mount
card.text: To play, discard 2 cards from hand. Bearer must be a Nazgûl. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, remove a threat to prevent that wound.

card.name: ·The Witch-king, Black Captain
card.text: Enduring. Each Man skirmishing The Witch-king loses all strength bonuses from weapons.

card.name: Charged Headlong
card.text: If you have initiative, discard a {Rohan} possession to play a {Rohan} possession from your discard pile.

card.name: Doom Drove Them
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a {Rohan} companion and either a {Gondor} Man or a {Shire} companion to add a {Rohan} token here. Skirmish: Remove a {Rohan} token here to exert a minion skirmishing a companion.

card.name: ·Éomer, Keeper of Oaths
card.text: Valiant. When you play Éomer (except in your starting fellowship), you may reveal the top 10 cards of your draw deck. You may play each {Rohan} possession revealed. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: ·Éowyn's Shield
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. The minion archery total is -1. Skirmish: If bearer is Éowyn, add a threat and discard Éowyns Shield to discard a hand weapon borne by a minion she is skirmishing.

card.name: Fury of the Northmen
card.text: Exert a minion skirmishing a mounted {Rohan} Man.

card.name: No Living Man
card.text: Exert Théoden to exert a minion for each Théoden signet you spot.

card.name: ·Rohirrim Army
card.text: To play, spot 3 {Rohan} companions. You may play Rohirrim Army any time you could play a regroup event. When you play Rohirrim Army, you may discard a minion.

card.name: ·Théoden, Tall and Proud
card.text: Valiant. While you can spot a {Rohan} Man, Théodens twilight cost is -1. When Théoden is killed, you may play a {Rohan} companion from your discard pile or draw deck.

card.name: Called Away
card.text: Regroup: Discard a {Sauron} minion, spot a companion (except the Ring-bearer), and remove X burdens, where X is that companions vitality, to return that companion to its owners hand.

card.name: Gorgoroth Agitator
card.text: Besieger. To play, spot a {Sauron} Orc. When you play this minion, if you can spot another besieger, you may add a threat for each companion over 4. Shadow: Remove a threat to play a {Sauron} engine from your discard pile.

card.name: Gorgoroth Assassin
card.text: Besieger. Assignment: Spot a {Sauron} engine or a site you control to assign this minion to an unbound companion.

card.name: Gorgoroth Berserker
card.text: Besieger. Enduring. To play, spot a {Sauron} Orc. Maneuver: If you have initiative, exert this minion twice to take control of a site. Maneuver: Remove a threat and exert this minion twice to take control of a site.

card.name: Gorgoroth Breaker
card.text: Besieger. Archery: Exert this minion or stack it on a site you control to make the fellowship archery total -2.

card.name: Gorgoroth Looter
card.text: Besieger. When you play this minion, you may remove a burden to play a besieger stacked on a site you control.

card.name: Gorgoroth Patrol
card.text: Besieger. Regroup: If this minion is stacked on a site you control, discard this minion to make the move limit for this turn -1.

card.name: Gorgoroth Servitor
card.text: Besieger. Archery: Return this minion to your hand to make the fellowship archery total -2 and prevent the Free Peoples player from using archery special abilities.

card.name: Gorgoroth Stormer
card.text: Besieger. Shadow: If you have initiative, exert this minion to add a burden and make the Free Peoples player draw a card.

card.name: Great Hill Troll
card.text: Besieger. Fierce. The twilight cost of this minion is -1 for each {Sauron} engine you spot. When you play this minion at sites 5{K} to 9K, you may discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.name: ·Grond, Hammer of the Underworld
card.text: Engine. Shadow: Play a {Sauron} minion to add a {Sauron} token here. Regroup: Remove X {Sauron} tokens here to discard a Free Peoples card (except a companion) with a twilight cost of X. Discard a {Sauron} minion or this possession.

card.name: ·Morgai
card.text: While you can spot a {Sauron} minion at site 5{K}, the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples players hand. Response: If a companion is played, discard a {Sauron} card from hand to take control of a site. Discard this condition.

card.name: Olog-hai of Mordor
card.text: Besieger. Fierce. The twilight cost of this minion is -2 for each {Sauron} minion stacked on a site. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a besieger stacked on a site you control. That besieger is fierce and damage +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Siege Troop
card.text: Besieger. Regroup: Exert this minion twice to take control of a site.

card.name: Their Marching Companies
card.text: Engine. To play, spot a {Sauron} minion. Regroup: Remove a threat to stack your {Sauron} minion on a site you control. Shadow: Remove a threat to play a {Sauron} minion stacked on a site you control.

card.name: ·Troll of Gorgoroth, Abomination of Sauron
card.text: Besieger. Fierce. To play, spot a {Sauron} Orc. The twilight cost of Troll of Gorgoroth is -2 for each {Sauron} engine you spot. Regroup: Exert Troll of Gorgoroth to stack your besieger on a site you control.

card.name: Closer and Closer He Bent
card.text: Regroup: Exert an unbound Hobbit and add a burden to reveal your hand. Place each Free Peoples card revealed this way beneath your draw deck.

card.name: ·Morgai Foothills
card.text: When the fellowship moves from site 4K, remove {1} for each Ring-bound companion you spot. Regroup: Discard a card from hand for each Ring-bound companion you spot. Discard this condition.

card.name: So Fair, So Desperate
card.text: If the Shadow has initiative, add a threat to make an unbound Hobbit strength +1 for each {Shire} card you spot.

card.name: Song of the Shire
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a {Shire} companion and either a {Rohan} companion or a {Gandalf} companion to add a {Shire} token here. Skirmish: Remove a {Shire} token here to prevent an unbound companion from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.name: ·Sting, Bane of the Eight Legs
card.text: Bearer must be Frodo or Sam. Response: If a fierce skirmish involving bearer is about to end, add a threat to discard a minion involved in that skirmish.

card.name: Straining Towards Us
card.text: Exert Frodo to remove {1} for each Frodo signet you spot.

card.name: Unheeded
card.text: If a minion exerts, exert an unbound Hobbit to wound that minion.

card.name: We Shall Meet Again Soon
card.text: If the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, exert an unbound Hobbit to place a Shadow card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.name: The Dimholt
card.text: Sanctuary. Underground. Fellowship: Add 3 threats to play an enduring companion from your draw deck.

card.name: City of the Dead
card.text: Underground. Shadow: Remove 2 burdens to play an enduring minion from your draw deck or discard pile.

card.name: Crashed Gate
card.text: At the start of the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player must add 3 threats or choose an opponent who may take control of a site.

card.name: Osgiliath Channel
card.text: River. Regroup: Spot your minion and 6 companions to make the Free Peoples player choose to move again this turn.

card.name: ·Merry, Noble Warrior
card.text: To play, spot a {Rohan} companion. Skirmish: Discard 4 cards from hand to make Merry strength +2 for each {Rohan} companion you spot.

card.name: ·Pippin, Guard of Minas Tirith
card.text: To play, spot a {Gondor} Man. Skirmish: Discard 4 cards from hand to wound a minion Pippin is skirmishing twice if that minion bears a fortification.
